backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, product catalog, categories, orders, carts, and comparison utilities with stable maps and initialization demo data.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report containing no collected features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON mapping frontend file paths to short summaries for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions providing a warm OKLCH color theme with light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router setup, theme provider, authentication checks, and profile setup modal gating.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog UI for adding or editing products with validation, category selection, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Wraps admin-only pages with authentication and admin-role checks, showing alerts when access is denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter name and optional email before continuing.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorAl: Reusable error alert component showing a title and message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout wrapping pages with top navigation, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a footer with branding, links, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements the top navigation bar with auth handling, cart badge, mobile menu, and conditional admin/user links.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image placeholder, details, price, and stock status linking to product detail page.
Shows a responsive grid of ProductCards with loading skeletons and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, categories, and cart data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app’s design system.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains validation helpers for product forms, checkout forms, and quantity inputs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays user profile info, quick actions, and handles logout using Internet Identity and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin overview showing total products, orders, and revenue, with navigation to product and order management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with loading and empty states, showing order summaries and linking to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management table with add, edit, delete, and demo‑data initialization actions.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items with product details, allows updating quantities and removing items, and displays cart total.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout by collecting shipping address, validating input, showing cart summary, and submitting the order.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders hero section, popular products, and feature highlights with navigation to shop.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and provides navigation to orders or shopping.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific order including items, totals, and shipping address.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists user order history with totals and timestamps, with links to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info, handles add‑to‑cart logic with authentication checks, and shows loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists products with search, category filtering, and sorting, fetching data from multiple product query hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versions, feature requests, and project status for adding flower products to the demo catalog.
